website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of the bonus brush kit, this is a good option, but the mask is no more effective and harder to remove than others we considered.
pros: In addition to the charcoal mask, this brand includes a 2-piece brush set that comes in handy during application
cons: Tends to pull skin during removal

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well, No Complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would actually use this but was very curious as to how it would feel. A friend convinced me to buy this and gave it a try. It worked well (as expected). Don't have anything else to compare it to. Skin felt clean after taking it off and it was actually pretty nice. Definitely recommended if you are interested in this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bass

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. Love the tools. Doesn’t hurt too bad...only stings a bit if you have peach fuzz. My nose has always been a problem area and this solved it! And FYI, I’ve only used it once. I do exfoliate twice a week but my nose never looked this clean and without black heads until now.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Flores

customer_reviews.title: hurts like hell to remove it haha
customer_reviews.text: Really does not do anything for me, hurts like hell to remove it haha, it was a bit expected but not that much. I recommend very thick layer and small area at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good for small sections, like nose
customer_reviews.text: Only good for small portions of face, even so it’s hard to get off, doesn’t always dry consistently or at all, and irritated my skin. Did my whole face once and a portion didn’t come off, had to keep scrubbing until that portion was raw.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle M

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do. Don’t get it ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. Don’t get it on your facial hair. My son called it my Batman mask when I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us...
customer_reviews.text: Would give 1 star, but the mask does make your skin feel clean after. But, as far as blackhead removal, it was far from that. I used the mask twice and my wife also used it twice and both saw minimal, if any, blackheads removed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser3233

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to apply and I love that there are two ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! It's easy to apply and I love that there are two applicators in the box. It does what it is supposed to and has helped clean my pokes out. I use it once a week because otherwise I find it is too drying for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: kray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: hurts a bit when removing but does what it says
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey  Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... my blackheads but not to the effectiveness I would like. I have sensitive skin so it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: It removes some of my blackheads but not to the effectiveness I would like. I have sensitive skin so it was a little irritating for the first coupe of hours after removing the mask. I feel this would work much better for someone with sensitive skin. Not too bad for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The item is nice feels like it does the job vey nice brushes. But with brushes you will put too much mask on. It will drip off your face.
customer_reviews.author: Durrango13

customer_reviews.title: Not that sticky
customer_reviews.text: Irritated my skin but that’s ok it wasn’t too bad
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This mask didn't remove any blackheads and was incredibly painful to peel off
customer_reviews.text: This mask didn't remove any blackheads and was incredibly painful to peel off. Not worth it. The only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 is it did make my skin fairly soft after. But not worth the pain, especially with no blackheads removed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: since the first and best one isn't available on amazon anymore
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one i've tried, since the first and best one isn't available on amazon anymore. This did nothing for my skin, but maybe yours is different.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I have tried many of these masks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have tried many of these masks and this one by far pulls the most amount of "gunk" from my face
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Very well
customer_reviews.text: Used immediately when I received it. Works well. Face is more clean and fresh after use.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Good product, dry face.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and did not hurt but it left my face pretty dry. A couple days of a lot of moisturization took care of that
customer_reviews.author: Kate Baehman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product detail
customer_reviews.text: The product says 250grams but it is actual total shipping weight (box, brush and mask together). The actual peel-off mask is only 120grams. I have not used the product yet but I got disappointed by misleading product detail. I will update the review after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuppa

customer_reviews.title: The addition of the brushes are perfect for application
customer_reviews.text: I could tell a difference after the first application, with noticeably smaller pores on my nose. I have been dealing with this issue since high school. The addition of the brushes are perfect for application. Once dried, you will have an incredibly difficult time trying to wash any of the product off, I must be peeled off. Please remember to wash your face prior to application, and ensure that all your hair is pulled back. Your skin will thank you for using this amazing products.
customer_reviews.author: A Burke

customer_reviews.title: Feels good!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many similar blackhead remover mask, I have to say that this one is the best. It's very thick. You may use those 2 rubber brushes attached, but I ended up using my fingers to spread it out. After it drys out, it sticks to your skin very well. When you pull it off, you will pull off your blackhead and some facial hair. Makes my skin super smooth. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: what i did really enjoy is the silicone facemask brushes
customer_reviews.text: honestly the mask was sub par, and hurts alot and removed less oil and gunk from my pores than my normal mud mask, what i did really enjoy is the silicone facemask brushes.
customer_reviews.author: ash hue

customer_reviews.title: Please bring it back!
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the result of this mask. It was cleaning my pores perfectly and this is the only product that comes with two nice brushes. Please bring it back, I need to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Loyal costumer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Cleans a little, nothing that an oil control cream wouldn't do. I had way better results with Proactive. Comparable to a good soap. 2 stars as I expected more from the adverrising, and really I don't see a reason to use/buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ottaviani Luigi

customer_reviews.title: My face feels soft...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for ten days now and my face feels soft after every use.. and it doesnt have a strong odor like others I have bought. Will def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: its okay. my friend likes it. when I pulled it off non of my blackheads came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace OConnor

customer_reviews.title: and really made my skin feel great! And the brushes are an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: Barely any pain whatsoever, and really made my skin feel great! And the brushes are an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I still would recommend a mask with higher stars
customer_reviews.text: It made my skin feel soft HOWEVER did not remove one blackhead. Mask did not hurt pulling off. I still would recommend a mask with higher stars. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this it's a really good product and it makes your skin really smooth
customer_reviews.author: tiango

customer_reviews.title: Better than the others
customer_reviews.text: The applicators are great-no more messy hands and fingers. Thick formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon junkie

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: works great!!! love the brushes that come with. no mess on the hand and in the nails!!!! going to use them on my husband tonight and cant wait!!
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: I paid for the brushes because the actual product is garbage!!
customer_reviews.text: I was too excited about this product based on the reviews but clearly they are fake... this didnt work at all. I paid for the brushes because the actual product is garbage!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good, but definitely put more at the edge ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, but definitely put more at the edge of the area you are putting it on so it's eaiser to peel off.

customer_reviews.title: Great, not perfect though
customer_reviews.text: Not so much with the pores, but I feel vibrancy after its usage. Super easy to apply with the applicators.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic :)

customer_reviews.title: Not legit
customer_reviews.text: Didnt do much and it dodnt peel off right i had to do by sections and it hurt!
customer_reviews.author: giovianna zamora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face super soft. I’ve been using it for 3 weeks and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Zenaida

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It hurts badly to pull it off and didn't remove anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watching me do this should be on a sitcom. ...
customer_reviews.text: Watching me do this should be on a sitcom. When they say apply a THIN layer, they mean it! Instead of 15-20 minutes to dry it was 40+.removing it was the sitcom.it didn't peel off in one swoop. In fact there wasn't swoop. Bits and pieces stuck to my face and had to use my fingernail to scratch it off. After 20 minutes I used oil to remove it. Dont get it near your hairline or eyebrows! OUCH! Can't say I'm glowing😜
customer_reviews.author: Alyce A. Schonwald

customer_reviews.title: clean
customer_reviews.text: Wash the face clean, with a trial the seller sent the next mask installed, a lot of dirty things, the seller also recommended that the pores of water, I think this mask must buy, finished cleaning will become large pores, the hair is perfect Shuizhen contraction. Can stick black, although not much, sticky, small gifts a lot, will continue to observe..

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product! It does a good job of cleaning my face. After using it, my skin condition have changed. I decide to stick to the product.
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: it's really cool, especially when I get the blackhead or dirty ...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest , when I peel the mask off, it's really cool, especially when I get the blackhead or dirty stuff down ,it really gives me a sense of accomplishment.
customer_reviews.author: zhiling zhao

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: When peeling, I didn't feel any pain and did see some of dirt was pulled out by the mask. My face seems softer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Rigogliosi

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: It peeled out some of my dead cell, white head and black head. I like it so far. I should get a dozen gold stars for showing such restraint!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Estrader

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife. She thought this mask is really easy to supply the water. She is very satisfied, so I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Hathcoat
